00153 {
00154     // Enable Main Oscillator
00155     // Main Oscillator startup time is board specific:
00156     // Main Oscillator Startup Time (18432KHz) corresponds to 1.5ms
00157     // (0x08 for AT91C_CKGR_OSCOUNT field)
00158     //
00159     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MOR = ( AT91C_CKGR_OSCOUNT & ( 0x8 << 8 ) )
00160                               | AT91C_CKGR_MOSCEN;
00161 
00162     // Wait until the oscillator is stabilized
00163     //
00164     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MOSCS ) );
00165 
00166     // Set PLL to 96MHz (96,10971429MHz) and UDP Clock to 48MHz
00167     // PLL Startup time depends on PLL RC filter
00168     // UDP Clock (48,05485714MHz=+0,114%) is compliant with the Universal Serial Bus
00169     // Specification (+/- 0.25% for full speed)
00170     //
00171     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PLLR 
00172        = AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV_1                        // DIV = 2
00173        | AT91C_CKGR_OUT_0
00174        | ( AT91C_CKGR_PLLCOUNT & ( 0x28 << 8 ) )    // PLLCOUNT = 50
00175        | ( AT91C_CKGR_MUL & ( 0x48 << 16 ) )        // MUL = 72
00176        | ( AT91C_CKGR_DIV & 0xE );                  // DIV = 14
00177 
00178     // Wait until the PLL is stabilized
00179     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_LOCK ) );
00180 
00181     // Selection of Master Clock MCK (equal to Processor Clock PCK) equal to
00182     // PLL/2 = 48MHz
00183     // The PMC_MCKR register must not be programmed in a single write operation
00184     // (see. Product Errata Sheet)
00185     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MCKR = AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_2;
00186     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00187 
00188     SET(AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MCKR, AT91C_PMC_CSS_PLL_CLK );
00189     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00190     }
